A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great visuals and cinematography. Mark Hamill's performance makes the movie. There were a couple of great locations and scenarios that sadly were not used to their full potential.\nThen there's lots of the \"meh\". Plot holes\, filler and unfinished stories from the previous movie. The abandonment of what makes Star Wars\, Star Wars. All to take the franchise in some Disneyesque direction. This is change for change's sake and it spoiled the experience.
